item.title: 智利养老金提案力图限制提高收益的掉期交易
item.description: 智利监管机构正在考虑制定基于风险和流动性的规则，以控制被称为 AFPs 的养老基金对衍生品的使用，在外国利率头寸帮助推动回报率在 2025 年创下八年新高，但导致对潜在财务压力的担忧之后，监管机构加强了审查。【原文：Chilean regulators are considering rules based on risk and liquidity to rein in the use of derivatives by pension funds known as AFPs, tightening their scrutiny after foreign interest rate positions helped push returns to an eight-year high in 2025 but led to concerns about potential financial strain.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国家石油公司计划开发新油田以提高产量
item.description: 尼日利亚国有石油生产商计划从明年起开发新油田，并寻求在本十年结束前筹集至少 300 亿美元资金，熟悉该计划的高级官员如是说。【原文：Nigeria’s state-owned oil producer plans to develop new oil fields from next year and seeks to raise at least $30 billion by the end of the decade, senior officials familiar with the plans said.】

item.title: 2026 年将发生什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 耐克和特斯拉大涨，美股蹒跚进入年末
item.description: 周三，S&P 500 指数开盘变化不大，耐克公司在其首席执行官买入股票的消息传出后股价攀升，而特斯拉公司则在著名投资者迈克尔-伯利（Michael Burry）本月早些时候称该公司 "估值高得离谱 "后表示他不会做空后股价飘绿。【原文：The S&P 500 Index opened little changed on Wednesday, with Nike Inc. climbing after news its CEO bought shares and Tesla Inc. in the green after famed investor Michael Burry said he’s not short despite calling the company “ridiculously overvalued” earlier this month.】

item.title: BCA Research聘请PGIM的魏斯伯格担任首席美国股票策略师
item.description: BCA Research聘请诺亚-韦斯伯格（Noah Weisberger）为首席美国股票策略师，聘请这位PGIM机构咨询部门的前董事总经理领导其所谓的对美国股票的 "重新构想"。【原文：BCA Research has hired Noah Weisberger as chief US equities strategist, tapping the former managing director at PGIM’s institutional advisory unit to lead what it called a “reimagining” of its coverage of American stocks.】

item.title: 特朗普公司将为股东发行新加密货币
item.description: 特朗普媒体和技术集团公司计划发行一种新的加密货币，并将在其股东之间进行分配。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group Corp. plans to issue a new cryptocurrency, which will be distributed among its shareholders.】

item.title: 伊朗抗议活动第四天，冲突波及首都以外地区
item.description: 伊朗人连续第四天举行抗议活动，抗议不断恶化的经济和生活水平，伊斯兰共和国各城市爆发了安全部队与平民之间的冲突。【原文：Iranians staged protests against worsening economic and living standards for a fourth day, with clashes between security forces and civilians erupting in cities across the Islamic Republic.】

item.title: 美国圣诞周申请失业救济人数降至 19.9 万
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周降至今年最低水平之一，加剧了假日季节数据的波动性。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week to one of the lowest levels this year, accentuating volatility in the data during the holiday season.】

item.title: 美国与非洲国家签署 160 亿美元卫生协议
item.description: 美国与象牙海岸签署了一项卫生协议，使唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府自退出世界卫生组织以来在非洲达成的双边协议总价值超过 160 亿美元。【原文：The US signed a health agreement with Ivory Coast bringing the total value of bilateral deals President Donald Trump’s administration has done in Africa since withdrawing from the World Health Organization to more than $16 billion.】

item.title: 习近平在新年贺词中盛赞中国在人工智能和芯片领域的成就
item.description: 习近平主席在新年致辞中强调了中国在人工智能和芯片产业方面取得的成就，并呼吁大家对中国未来一年的发展道路充满信心。【原文：President Xi Jinping highlighted China’s achievements in artificial intelligence and the chip industry in a triumphant New Year’s Eve speech as he called for more confidence in the country’s development path in the year ahead.】

item.title: 2025 年特朗普执政时期的美国经济状况
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统乘着选民对经济失望的浪潮连任白宫，承诺降低物价并为国家带来 "黄金时代"。【原文：President Donald Trump rode a wave of voter frustration about the economy to a second term in the White House, promising lower prices and a “golden age” for the nation.】

item.title: 抗议活动后肯尼亚第三季度经济增长放缓
item.description: 抗议活动震撼肯尼亚后，该国第三季度经济增长放缓。【原文：Kenya’s economic growth slowed in the third quarter after protests rocked the nation.】

item.title: 食糖年度跌幅将创 2017 年以来最大，因前景过剩
item.description: 原糖创下八年来最大年度跌幅，供应充足的前景拖累了甜味剂。【原文：Raw sugar headed for the biggest annual decline in eight years, with the sweetener weighed down by the prospect of ample supplies.】

item.title: 寒流将法国核能产量提升至 2019 年以来最高水平
item.description: 随着寒流带来的电力需求增长，法国核电机组的发电量超过了近七年来的任何时候。【原文：France’s nuclear fleet is generating more electricity than at any point in almost seven years as power demand rises on the back of a cold snap.】

item.title: 印度经济增长强劲，誓言为全球波动提供缓冲
item.description: 印度央行表示，印度经济将保持高速增长，当局将采取措施抵御全球经济波动带来的潜在冲击。【原文：India is set to sustain high economic growth and authorities will take measures to shield it from potential shocks due to volatility in the global economy, the central bank said.】

item.title: 美达与马努斯的交易验证了对中国创新的信心
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Vlad Savov 和陈露露将关注中国风险投资圈对 Meta 收购 Manus 的热烈反应。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov and Lulu Chen look at the enthusiastic reaction in Chinese VC circles to Meta’s acquisition of Manus.】

item.title: 阿根廷一月份债券付款仍缺 24 亿美元
item.description: 距离 1 月 9 日的最后期限只剩下五个交易日，尽管阿根廷财政部最近努力增加美元储备，但在 43 亿美元的欠款中，阿根廷财政部只有 19 亿美元。【原文：With just five trading days left ahead of a crucial Jan. 9 deadline, Argentina’s Treasury only has $1.9 billion of the $4.3 billion it owes despite recent efforts to bolster the country’s stash of dollars.】

item.title: 进入 2026 年，中国工厂开始升温
item.description: 美国工厂举步维艰，中国制造业却呈现升温迹象【原文：While factories in the US struggle, China’s manufacturing sector shows signs of heating up】

item.title: 美联储大戏上演，美元将创 2017 年以来最差年景
item.description: 美元将出现八年来最大幅度的年度回落，投资者称，如果下一任美联储主席如预期那样选择更大幅度的降息，美元将出现更多跌幅。【原文：The dollar is poised for its sharpest annual retreat in eight years and investors say more declines are coming if the next Federal Reserve chief opts for deeper interest-rate cuts as expected.】

item.title: 这些股票是 2025 年市场的最大赢家和输家
item.description: 在人工智能热情的推动下，S&P 500 指数有望在 2025 年年底上涨超过 17%，牛市将持续第三年。【原文：The S&P 500 Index is poised to end 2025 up more than 17% as the bull market continues for a third year driven by enthusiasm for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 突尼斯中央银行下调关键利率以促进经济增长
item.description: 突尼斯今年第二次下调基准利率，因为这个北非国家正试图提振疲软的经济增长率。【原文：Tunisia cut it’s benchmark interest rate for the second time this year as the North African nation attempts to boost weak economic growth rates.】

item.title: 在今年令人胃痛的市场中，逢低买入得到了回报
item.description:
在动荡不安的一年里，DeepSeek、贸易战和真实战争令投资者惶恐不安。【原文：

DeepSeek, trade war and real war rattled investors in a volatile year.

】

item.title: 大亨埃卢梅卢收购尼日利亚最大石油勘探公司股份
item.description: 尼日利亚大亨托尼-埃卢梅卢的公司同意收购尼日利亚价值最大的石油勘探公司 20% 的股份，以扩大其能源业务。【原文：Nigerian tycoon Tony Elumelu’s company agreed to acquire a 20% stake in the nation’s biggest oil explorer by value to expand his energy business.】

item.title: 总理认为增长面临挑战，2025 年新加坡国内生产总值增长 4.8
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪表示，新加坡经济在 2025 年实现了 4.8% 的强劲增长，超过预期，并警告说，要保持这一速度将面临挑战。【原文：Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong said the city-state’s economy delivered a stronger-than-expected growth of 4.8% in 2025 and warned that sustaining the pace will be challenging.】

item.title: 以色列交易所改为周一至周五交易以吸引资本
item.description: 从下周开始，特拉维夫证券交易所（TASE）的交易日将改为周一至周五，因为以色列在经历了两年的战争之后，正努力增强其对国际投资者的吸引力。【原文：Starting next week, the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange (TASE) will shift its trading days to a Monday-Friday schedule as Israel seeks to boost its appeal to international investors following two years of war.】

item.title: 台湾券商冻结中国军工股和 ETF 买单
item.description: 台湾经纪商将停止接受与中国军工企业有关联的股票和交易所交易基金的买入订单，这是北京在台湾岛附近举行军事演习后紧张局势恶化的一个迹象。【原文：Taiwanese brokers will stop taking buy orders for shares and exchange-traded funds linked to Chinese military companies, a sign of worsening tensions after Beijing conducted military drills near the island.】

item.title: 黄金刺激加纳塞地实现至少 1994 年以来的首次年度上涨
item.description: 由于非洲最大的黄金生产国受益于金属价格上涨和美元疲软，加纳货币兑美元汇率三十多年来首次实现年度上涨。【原文：Ghana’s currency posted an annual gain against the dollar for the first time in more than three decades as Africa’s biggest gold producer benefited from rising prices of the metal and the greenback’s weakness.】

item.title: 欧洲股市屡创新高，将迎来 2021 年以来最好的一年
item.description: 法国股市走低，英国股市持稳，欧洲基准股市将于 2025 年接近历史高点。【原文：French shares edged lower and UK stocks were steady as the European benchmark was set to wrap up 2025 near record highs.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行第三季度未采取货币干预措施
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税迫使官员们在前一时期抛售法郎之后，瑞士国家银行在第三季度基本上没有介入货币市场，避免了干预。【原文：The Swiss National Bank largely kept out of currency markets in the third quarter, avoiding interventions after Donald Trump’s tariffs had forced officials to sell francs in the previous period.】

item.title: 银行业推动西班牙股市反弹，创下 1993 年以来最佳年景
item.description: 西班牙股市有望创下自 20 世纪 90 年代初以来的最佳表现，而且由于盈利前景光明，策略师们预测还会有更多涨幅。【原文：Spanish stocks are poised for their best showing since the early 1990s and strategists predict more gains to come thanks to a brightening earnings outlook.】
